details.description: Register your profile, search vacancies and apply for apprenticeships - you must be 16 or over
details.more_information:
You can also search and apply for apprenticeships in other parts of the UK.

[Apprenticeships in Northern Ireland (nidirect website)](http://www.nidirect.gov.uk/apprenticeshipsni "Apprenticeships in Northern Ireland (nidirect website)")  
[Apply for an apprenticeship in Scotland (MappIT website)](http://www.mappit.org.uk/ "Apply for an apprenticeship in Scotland (MappIT website)")  
[Apply for an apprenticeship in Wales (careerswales website)](https://ams.careerswales.com/Public/Default.aspx?mode=vacancy&timenow=164517 "Apply for an apprenticeship in Wales (careerswales website)")
details.introduction: You can register your profile, search vacancies and apply for apprenticeships in England. You must be 16 years or over, living in England and not in full-time education.

details.description: Includes job search, volunteering, apprenticeships and job offers
Includes holidays and finding a job

tags.title: How to find a course and understanding qualifications

details.description: Includes 14 to 19 education, higher and further education, further study and training
Get help if you're at school, planning to go on to further or higher education, looking for training or interested in a student or career development loan.
